description:
1: Gather all ingredients.
 2: Preheat oven to 400F
3:Rub olive oil, salt and seasoning on chicken breast and place in broiler pan
4: Bake for 10 mins, flip and bake another 15 mins. inside temp should read 165 degrees
5: Remove chicken
6: scrape pan and pour chicken broth into pan and scrape up solids.
7: drizzle on sauce and enjoy!
ingredients: 4 skinless boneless breast halves, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp sea salt, 1 pinch Creole seasoning, 1 tbsp chicken broth
